about:
Hi! I'm Anshima — a passionate Full Stack Web Developer with a flair for creativity and a drive for excellence. I build dynamic web applications using the MERN stack, and I also have hands-on experience in UI/UX design and 3D modeling in Blender.

Alongside tech, I’m proud of my academic journey — a consistent school topper, with 96% in 12th, 91% in 10th, and an impressive 8.6 CGPA in my engineering branch, where I currently hold the top rank.

I'm also a dedicated volleyball player and an athlete, having represented my college at district, AKTU zonal & States levels. Whether I’m designing an interface, coding a solution, or training on the field, I bring the same energy, discipline, and passion to everything I do.

Let’s connect and create something impactful — in 2D, 3D, or on the web!
